body.p: The Vendor Defined Firmware Activate command supplements the standard NVMe Firmware Activate command. Vendor Defined Firmware Activate command allows you to perform all the activation actions on the read-only firmware slot. If the Activate Action is to replace the firmware image in the specified firmware slot, the NVMe Firmware Download command will be issued before theVendor Defined Firmware Activate command.
Refer to for the control flow.
